description.value:
This strange leather mask protects you from the hellish fumes of the underworld.

Head Slot: Rare

Property:

You have resist 15 poison, and you are immune to all effects of this item's attack power.

Power ✦ Daily Attack (Standard Action)

Attack: Area burst 2 within 20 (creatures in the burst); your level + 3 vs. Fortitude

Hit: 10d6 necrotic and poison damage, and the target cannot regain hit points (save ends).

Miss: Half damage.

Effect: The burst creates a zone that lasts until the end of your next turn. Any creature that ends its turn in the zone takes 15 necrotic and poison damage. The zone is heavily obscured for creatures besides you.

Sustain Standard: The zone persists until the end of your next turn.

Power ✦ Daily Utility (Move Action)

Effect: You teleport 10 squares to a square inside the zone created by this item's attack power.
